item.title: ::item sharing
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_So_Cool Java Is So Cool
item.description:
@Java_Is_So_Cool wrote:

How can I share the ::item command with my friend like say

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“namehere”)) {
try {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
if (args.length == 3) {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
c.getItems().addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“That item ID does not exist.”);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“Wrong usage: (Ex:(::item_ID_Amount)(::item 995 1))”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {

			}
		}[/code]

just with my friend added into the playername.

Read full topic
